my parents met at woodstock.

participant_2.background:
I'm not rich, but I love technology and I have a sweet tooth.
I work out in my home gym to keep fit.
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
i work at a grocery store.
i love bruno mars.

content.text: Not much, just working out. How about you?
Oh cool, I'm just writing. I have a lot of free time these days.
That's awesome, what are you writing about?
I'm writing a novel. It's about a young woman who moves to a new city to pursue her culinary dreams.
Wow, that sounds really cool! I'm sure it'll be a great success.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm really excited about it.
I'm sure you'll do great. So, what's your favorite Bruno Mars song?
Oh man, that's a tough one. But I think I'd have to say "Uptown Funk".
That's a great song! I love Bruno Mars.
Me too! He's one of my favorite artists.
Yeah, he's really talented. So, what do you do for fun?
I love to read, go to concerts, and hang out with friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common. I love to read, go to concerts, and hang out with friends too.
That's awesome! We should hang out sometime.
That sounds like a great idea
